name: Captain Laser
description:
Made for Mini Jam -12- with the theme Heroes.

Limitation was to use basic shapes only.

Protect the hostage for three minutes from the wave of enemies!

Use WASD for movement and SPACE to shoot.

You can only shoot while moving! Keep moving!

Made by Topper @Topper_Games

Music used is CC0, made by

Romariogrande, him again, and mickeymephistopheles

Cover Image made by PM - GoatBoatGames
